Title: Optical Identification of Cepheids in 19 Host Galaxies of Type Ia 
       Supernovae and NGC 4258 with the Hubble Space Telescope
Authors: Hoffmann S.L., Macri L.M., Riess A.G., Yuan W., Casertano S., 
         Foley R.J., Filippenko A.V., Tucker B.E., Chornock R., 
         Silverman J.M., Welch D.L., Goobar A., Amanullah R. 
Table: HII region properties
================================================================================
Byte-by-byte Description of file: apjaa3610t7_mrt.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units    Label      Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1-  5 A5     ---      Galaxy     Galaxy name
   7- 10 A4     ---      Name       HII region identifier (1)
  12- 13 I2     h        RAh        Hour of Right Ascension (J2000)
  15- 16 I2     min      RAm        Minute of Right Ascension (J2000)
  18- 22 F5.2   s        RAs        Second of Right Ascension (J2000)
      24 A1     ---      DE-        Sign of the Declination (J2000)
  25- 26 I2     deg      DEd        Degree of Declination (J2000)
  28- 29 I2     arcmin   DEm        Arcminute of Declination (J2000)
  31- 35 F5.2   arcsec   DEs        Arcsecond of Declination (J2000)
  37- 41 F5.2   kpc      Radius     Deprojected galactocentric radius (2)
  43- 47 F5.3   [-]      Z          Metallicity where Z=12+log[O/H]
  49- 53 F5.3   [-]    e_Z          Uncertainty in metallicity (Z)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note (1): Names starting with 'N' indicate new data observed after analysis 
          and not utilized in metallicity gradient fits in Table 8.
Note (2): Based on the distances from Table 5 of R16 [2016ApJ...826...56R].
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
